name: Bandit Rider 3D: smash cops racing
description:
Meet the most addictive and dynamic bandit game with the fastest cop chases - Bandit Rider 3D: smash cops racing.

You are the well known bandit rider, who escaped the cops persecution for many-many times. And you know what you have to do this time.

Don't wait that in the cop cars will wait you sweet girls with pink bow-knots. They are mad and angry cops. Certainly they can stop your motorcycle slowly but they won't do that. They want to brutal smash your bike to metal rubbish.

There are most extreme motorcycles at your disposal in the garage. Ride fast, escape chases and earn money to buy more charged and faster bandit bikes.

You should to know you are on the roads where is no any laws. So ride your motorcycle as fast as you can and don't allow cops to smash you.
